item.title: 2020 OSCP Contest
item.author: Rob Fuller
item.description: Last year I decided to give away 3 vouchers to PWK 60 days of labs. This was of my own free will and under no umbrella. I wanted to give back to the community and industry that provided a means to which I can feed, clothe, and put a roof over my family’s head. But, how to give away something like this? I didn’t want it to go to people who just were faster at coding than someone else, or could figure out some obscure CTF challenge.
